name: Materialis Companion
author: Extend Themes

sections.description:
The Materialis Companion plugin adds drag and drop page builder functionality to the Materialis theme.

The Materialis Companion plugin features include:

  • Beautiful ready-made homepage
  • Drag and drop page customization
  • 30+ predefined content sections
  • Live content editing
  • and many other features

License

Materialis Companion WordPress plugin, Copyright (C) 2017 Horea Radu
Materialis Companion WordPress plugin is licensed under the GPL3 (https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.en.html).

Unless otherwise specified, all the theme files and scripts are licensed under GNU General Public License.

    Licensed under the BSD3 license (https://opensource.org/licenses/BSD-3-Clause)
    Copyright (c) 2013-2017 Sascha Droste pid@posteo.net

  • Kirki by Aristeides Stathopoulos – https://github.com/aristath/kirki
    Licensed under the MIT license (https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT)

  • Images

sections.reviews:
Awesome theme

By brissystudio on July 22, 2020

Great theme, works seamlessly and very easy for our customers to manage their contents. Outstanding support

Beatiful theme and excellent support

By eddypiv on July 6, 2020

I have received very positive feedback from various customers about my website. I raised 2 support requests, and both were responded and resolved within 24 hours. Very good stuff!

I love it!!!

By naderik on July 2, 2020

I love it!!! The Theme and the team is amazing. Whenever I have problems, I get great support within a short time.

Materialis

By foxypenguin77 on May 26, 2020

Very good plugin and the support was excellent for adding the video to the home page. Very prompt with replies and my website now looks fab!

Almost Worth It

By drewvancamp on December 3, 2019

Be warned: support for this plugin seems lacking. This makes the layout issues I've experienced with the related theme a deal breaker, since I cannot reliably display page content.

Good looking theme and good support

By ds1995 on November 27, 2019

I’m using this theme since a couple of weeks. It looks good and it’s very simple. Also the support is fast and give you the right solution.

Prompt and effective support

By ezerb on October 15, 2019

Support team solved my two issues in less than one our, almost incredible!

Very convenient theme and responsive devs

By jbenmenachem on September 9, 2019

I've been pretty pleased with the quality of this theme out of the box, and the devs have been very responsive and helpful with the few customizations I wasn't sure how to make on my own. Recommend to anyone who needs a good-looking, adaptable theme for a variety of uses.

Very great!

By judithborer on September 5, 2019

Veramente bravissimi, supporto eccellente e velocissimo, congratulazioni, avanti così! Grazie a tutti, in particolare a Cristian Barbu!

Great plugin and support!

By (rraallvv) on May 15, 2019

The plugin is really awesome, is highly flexible and customizable, even in the free version, and support is phenomenal!
